question:
Who of the following were associated with the Hindustan Socialist Republican Association (HSRA)?
1. Chandra Shekhar Azad
2. Bhagat Singh
3. Bhagwati Charan Vohra
4. Sukhdev
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Hindustan Socialist Republican Association (HSRA) was founded by Chandra Shekhar Azad in the year 1928 at Feroz Shah Kotla. Important members of the organization are Bhagat Singh, Bhagwati Charan Vohra, Shukdev, Batukeswar Dutt.
